welcome_message_body: Welcome to Orvault, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and gardens. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer. Bon voyage!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nantes Atlantique Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Nantes Atlantique Airport, mainly used for low-cost and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and follow the instructions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montoir Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Montoir Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
